name: you wont believe what they did!
name_original: you wont believe what they did!
description:
just for fun playable version of this tumblr post: https://simtunes.tumblr.com/post/626083886463664128/heres-the-start-screen-of-a-wii-game-i-dreamt

made in about three hours so it's probably messy. sounds used are either default fungus noises, the wii theme, or the gba startup sound.
